body:
Reason: using alts to circumvent siege cooldown

~~I don't think this rule is in the rules yet, so if that's correct I think this ban and all the other ones should be reversed.~~ Also this was an account created prior to this incident so it was not solely used for evasion, so the ban should be temporary like the main account.

In any case to all of you who didn't believe me earlier: I told you so, again.

Edit: It is in the rules but my point that none of the bans should be permanent still stands.

body:
>Also this was an account created prior to this incident so it was not solely used for evasion, so the ban should be temporary like the main account

I agree. If the account was not used to evade the rules, it shouldn't be banned permanently. I think that all these permabans are too harsh anyways. The admins should list out all the punishments for breaking the individual rules (like Unmarked NSFW: 1-3 days, Spam: 1 day, Repeated spam (like the Endless Summer guy): Permanent, etc.) so we can discuss them and say which ones seem too harsh.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
Also this was an account created prior to this incident so it was not solely used for evasion, so the ban should be temporary like the main account

I agree. If the account was not used to evade the rules, it shouldn't be banned permanently. I think that all these permabans are too harsh anyways. The admins should list out all the punishments for breaking the individual rules (like Unmarked NSFW: 1-3 days, Spam: 1 day, Repeated spam (like the Endless Summer guy): Permanent, etc.) so we can discuss them and say which ones seem too harsh.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]
